How can I use the `listaddressgroupings` command with the JSON-RPC API?

You can use the `listaddressgroupings` command with the JSON-RPC API by sending a POST request to `http://127.0.0.1:27486/` with the following JSON data:
```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "1.0",
  "id": "curltest",
  "method": "listaddressgroupings",
  "params": []
}
```
You can use tools like `curl` to send the request.

listaddressgroupings Lists groups of addresses which have had their common ownership made public by common use as inputs or as the resulting change in past transactions Result: [  [   [    "VRSC address",   (string) The VRSC address    amount,         (numeric) The amount in VRSC    "account"       (string, optional) The account (DEPRECATED)   ]   ,...  ]  ,... ] Examples: > verus listaddressgroupings > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listaddressgroupings", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
